subject: Re: Where is everybody?
author: rasterer
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Dave Koenig <floridajakeblues@...> wrote:
>
> The group was infiltrated by Jose Alvarez... An illegal alien who was director of the JREF... He has been arrested by the FBI for fraud and identity theft... You can google. For more on the scandal !!!

If by JREF you mean the James Randi Educational Foundation, I googled, and Jose Alvarez was never a JREF director.
